languages.text: В добывающих комплексах становится тесно от каторжан. Огромные купола из кристалфлекса, чьи фильтрационные алтари очищают воду и воздух, вместят куда больше работников.
The mining complexes are becoming overcrowded with convicts. The massive crystalflex domes, whose filtration altars purify the water and air, will fit far more workers.
languages.original_text: В добывающих комплексах становится тесно от каторжан. Огромные купола из кристалфлекса, чьи фильтрационные алтари очищают воду и воздух, вместят куда больше работников.

traits.locale_text: The mining complexes are getting crowded with convicts. The massive crystalflex domes, whose filtration altars purify the water and air, will fit far more workers.

The mining complexes are becoming overcrowded with convicts. The massive crystalflex domes, whose filtration altars purify the water and air, will fit far more workers.

languages.text: Les complexes miniers connaissent une surpopulation de condamnés. Les énormes dômes en cristalflex, dont les autels de filtration purifient l'eau et l'air, pourront accueillir bien plus d'ouvriers.
languages.original_text: The mining complexes are becoming overcrowded with convicts. The massive crystalflex domes, whose filtration altars purify the water and air, will fit far more workers.

traits.locale_text: Les complexes miniers connaissent une surpopulation de condamnés. Les énormes dômes en cristalflex, dont les autels de filtration purifient l'eau et l'air, pourront accueillir bien plus d'ouvriers.

languages.text: 採掘施設は囚人たちで過密状態になりつつある。水と空気を浄化するろ過祭壇のある巨大なクリスタルフレックスドームなら、はるかに多くの労働者を収容できる。
languages.original_text: The mining complexes are becoming overcrowded with convicts. The massive crystalflex domes, whose filtration altars purify the water and air, will fit far more workers.

traits.locale_text: 採掘施設は囚人たちで過密状態になりつつある。水と空気を浄化するろ過祭壇のある巨大なクリスタルフレックスドームなら、はるかに多くの労働者を収容できる。

languages.text: 综合采矿中心里的犯人越来越多了。巨大的有机水晶温室设置了过滤祭坛，不断净化水和空气，准备接纳更多劳工。
languages.original_text: The mining complexes are becoming overcrowded with convicts. The massive crystalflex domes, whose filtration altars purify the water and air, will fit far more workers.

traits.locale_text: 综合采矿中心里的犯人越来越多了。巨大的有机水晶温室设置了过滤祭坛，不断净化水和空气，准备接纳更多劳工。

languages.text: Hay demasiados presos en los complejos mineros. Cabrán muchos más trabajadores en las enormes cúpulas de flexicristal cuyos altares de filtración purifican el agua y el aire.
languages.original_text: The mining complexes are becoming overcrowded with convicts. The massive crystalflex domes, whose filtration altars purify the water and air, will fit far more workers.

traits.locale_text: Hay demasiados presos en los complejos mineros. Cabrán muchos más trabajadores en las enormes cúpulas de flexicristal cuyos altares de filtración purifican el agua y el aire.

languages.text: Die Bergbaukomplexe quillen langsam über vor Sträflingen. In die riesigen Flexikristall-Kuppeln, deren Filteraltare das Wasser und die Luft reinigen, passen viel mehr Arbeiter.
languages.original_text: The mining complexes are becoming overcrowded with convicts. The massive crystalflex domes, whose filtration altars purify the water and air, will fit far more workers.

traits.locale_text: Die Bergbaukomplexe quillen langsam über vor Sträflingen. In die riesigen Flexikristall-Kuppeln, deren Filteraltare das Wasser und die Luft reinigen, passen viel mehr Arbeiter.

languages.text: Mahkûmlar, maden tesislerine sığmamaya başladı. Filtre sunaklarıyla su ve havayı temizleyebilen devasa esnekristal kubbeler, çok daha fazla işçiye ev sahipliği yapabilecektir.
languages.original_text: The mining complexes are becoming overcrowded with convicts. The massive crystalflex domes, whose filtration altars purify the water and air, will fit far more workers.
